metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6870 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Applications which spawn a Toast notification in a background thread mayhave obscured fullscreen notifications displayed by Firefox.*This issue only affects Android versions of Firefox and Firefox Focus.*This vulnerability affects Firefox < 121.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
